info.title: provisioning_api
info.description: This application enables a set of APIs that external systems can use to manage users, groups and apps.

get.summary: Get a list of installed apps

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter for enabled or disabled apps

get.summary: Get the app info for an app

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of groups returned

get.summary: Get a list of groups details

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of groups returned

get.summary: Get a list of users in the specified group

403.description: Missing permissions to get users in the group

get.summary: Get a list of users details in the specified group

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of groups returned

get.summary: Get the list of user IDs that are a subadmin of the group
Get a list of users in the specified group

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of groups returned

parameters.name: subadmin
parameters.description: Groups where the user is subadmin

403.description: Missing permissions to make user subadmin

get.summary: Get a list of users and their details

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the amount of groups returned

post.summary: Search users by their phone numbers

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location of the phone number (for country code)

get.summary: Get the details of a user

put.summary: Update a value of the user's details

get.summary: Get the details of the current user
Get a list of fields that are editable for the current user
Get a list of fields that are editable for a user

put.summary: Update multiple values of the user's details

post.summary: Wipe all devices of a user

get.summary: Get a list of groups the user belongs to

post.summary: Add a user to a group

delete.summary: Remove a user from a group

get.summary: Get the groups a user is a subadmin of

post.summary: Make a user a subadmin of a group

delete.summary: Remove a user from the subadmins of a group

get.summary: Get the config keys of an app
Get a the config value of an app

parameters.name: defaultValue
parameters.description: Default returned value if the value is empty

post.summary: Update the config value of an app

delete.summary: Delete a config key of an app

post.summary: Update a preference value of an app

delete.summary: Delete a preference for an app

post.summary: Update multiple preference values of an app

delete.summary: Delete multiple preferences for an app
